summary: Irène, a strong french believer of communist utopia, is the happiest one when the Red Army Chorus announce they are coming to the Parisian stage.
cast: Josiane Balasko|Maurice Bénichou|Catherine Hiegel|Jean-François Dérec|Viktor Neznanov|Aleksandr Piskaryov|Aleksey Maslov|Jérémy Davis|Christine Dejoux|Jacques Herlin|André Oumansky|Patrick Burgel|Charles Aknin|Raymonde Aknin|Rosalie Becker|Henri Dorothe|Jean Golgevit|Raymond Huard|Sylvie Huguel|Anne-Marie Jabraud|Ivan Kertesz|Jean-Pierre Lefèvre|Marc Maury|Claude Merlin|Marie-France Mignal|Daniel Milgram|Claude Pascadel|Lilly Reka|Lilly Scherr|Jacqueline Segard|André Szöts|Irene Zilbermann|Nicolas Boukhrief
title: No todo el mundo puede presumir de haber tenido unos padres comunistas
